errors.error-upload-file-to-large: This file ist too large. The maximum filesize allowed is 500MB.
errors.error-while-processing-upload: There was an unexpected error on the server while processing your upload. Please try again later.
errors.error-while-preparing-download: There was an unexpected error on the server while preparing your download. Please try again later.
errors.login-password-mismatch: We could not find an account that mached these credentials.
errors.login-permission-denied: You do not have the permission to login.
errors.no-tenant-found: We could not find an app for this domain.
errors.permission-to-page-denied: You do not have permission to this page.
errors.reset-token-invalid: This reset token is expired or invalid. Please request a new token.
errors.too-many-requests: You reached the limit for requests. Please try again in {retryAfter} seconds.
errors.verify-email-token-invalid: There was an error while validating your email address.
errors.javascript-disabled: Javascript is disabled in your Browser. You need to enable javascript to use Atropos.

settings.admin-contact:
This email address will be used if Atropos ever needs to get in contact with you.
You will resceive notifications about important updates or if we detected something that does not seem right.
settings.user-contact: The user contact can be used as an additional contact address. Ideally it should be someone that takes resonsibility for the content on your site.
settings.user-contact-public-access:
You can also allow public access to this contact via the public api.
This allows you to setup a contact form on your website and allow visitors to contact you without exposing an email address.
settings.branding:
Here you can customize to look of Atropos. Fist you can choose a color that will be applied to the logo. Make sure you choose a color that is legible on a bright and a dark background.
You can also set a custom name and abreviation for your brand. This will also be used in the subject of mails sent by Atropos.
If you leave a field empty, the default value of Atropos will be used for that field.
settings.clear-cache:
Atropos uses a cache to accelerate pageloads for your website.
It caches content like blogposts, pages and galleries, as well as users and their permissions.
If you made a lot of changes, you can clear the cache and force all content to be reloaded.
settings.developer-info: The following information may be required in order to connect your website to the Atropos-API.
settings.developer-mode:
When Developer Mode is enabled, you will have access to some additional information that can be usefull during the development of a website.
For example you can see the id for content-blocks or set a custom created_at date for blog posts. Also, the caching-layer for the frontend will be disabled.
You should disable this setting before going live.
settings.locale: Chooose the language that will be used for the user interface, as well as all communication to your users.
settings.stats-storage-update-infrequent: It can take a while until the statistics reflect changes.

auth.two-fa: Open the two-factor authentication app on your device to view your authentication code and verify your identity.

articles.create-fist-article-content: Click this button to create your first blog post.

blocks.create-fist-block-content: Click this button to create your first content block.

galleries.create-fist-gallery-content: Create your first gallery in just a few seconds. Start by clicking this button.
galleries.create-fist-gallery-title: Only 3 Clicks away from your first gallery

message.delete-user: This will permanently delete the user. Continue?
message.drag-multiple-photos-here: Drag one or more photos here
message.auth-email-is-not-verified-message: To ensure that our mailing list contains only those who wish to be on it, we have sent a confirmation link to your email address. Pleas click on the link it cantains to validate your email address.
message.auth-email-is-not-verified-link: Click this link, to send a new email

message.modules-content-blocks-delete-block: Once you delete a block, there is no going back. Please be certain.

message.password-reset-sent-message: If you have lost your password, you should click the link in the email. You will be able to choose a new password. The email link must be clicked within a limited time.
message.password-reset-sent-title: We have sent an email to {email} with further instruction.
message.upload-file-button--file-too-large: This File is too large. Only files smaller than {size} are allowed.

The connection to the backend server was interupted.
Please wait while we try to reconnect...
message.ws-connection-failed-message:
The connection to the backend server was closed. Please logout and try again later.
The problem should be resolved soon.

files.name: Name
files.no-teams: You do not have access to any teams.
files.select-object-to-view-info: Select a file or folder to view its details.

browser.select-file: Select a photo from your computer
browser.title: Media Browser

administration-roles.description:
This permission gives access to the role and permission administration.
Only grant this permission to trusted administrators.
administration-roles.name: Roles

administration-settings.description:
This permission allows the user to manage general application settings, as well as access to some managemant tasks like deleting events triggered by other users.
Only grant this permission to trusted administrators.
administration-settings.name: Settings

administration-users.description:
This permission gives access to the user administration.
Only grant this permission to trusted administrators.
administration-users.name: Users

events.description: Allows a user to see public and private events.
events.name: Events

login.description: Users with this permission are allowed to login.
login.name: Login

modules-blog-articles.description:
Allow the user to create, update and delete blog posts.
The user can also publish and edit existing posts written by other users.
modules-blog-articles.name: Articles

modules-blog-categories.description: Allow the user to create, update and delete categories used to tag blog posts.
modules-blog-categories.name: Categories

modules-content-blocks.description: Allow the user to create, update and delete blocks.
modules-content-blocks.name: Blocks

modules-content-galleries.description: Allow the user to create, update and delete galleries.
modules-content-galleries.name: Galleries

modules-files-objects.description:
Granting this permission gives the user access to the file module. This permission is needed for the user to see the module, but it does not mean the user has access to any files.
Permission to files are handles separately per team.
modules-files-objects.name: Files

modules-files-teams.description: With this permission the user is allowed to create teams and manage who has access to files.
modules-files-teams.name: Teams

modules-mails-lists.description: Allow the user to create edit and delete mailinglists.
modules-mails-lists.name: Mailinglists

modules-mails-send.description: This allows a user to send mails to other users and to predefined mailinglists.
modules-mails-send.name: Send an Email

modules-media-browser.description: This permission is required to browse the media library and upload new images for galleries and blog posts.
modules-media-browser.name: Media

modules-media-files.description: This permission is required to manage the media library.
modules-media-files.name: Media-Library

profile.description:
Allow the user to edit their profile.
Without this permission the user can not change their name, email or password.
profile.name: Profile

password.min: Your password needs to be at least 6 characters long
